group_1.narration: The final moments of these Magical Girls,@and the hope they entrusted to me.
The memories of those involved are inscribed here,@along with their thoughts and emotions.
That's why I think this inherited hope deserves@more than what someone like me can provide.
This hope goes to Rabi and the others…@So they'll never give up again.

group_1.textCenter: What will happen when Dolma finds out that@I'm dead?
She's a total crybaby, so I'm worried she'll do@something drastic…
But I'm sure she'll be okay in the end.
Without anyone to cling to, she'll find her own@footing.
Everything I did for everyone, for Dolma,@and for myself…
I have no regrets.@I'm glad I did it.
So thank you Rabi.@You recognized my resignation.
With that, I leave my final hope for the future@of Magical Girls.
But even so…it's scary when your end is nigh…
Please let me cling onto my memories of you@to the very, very end.
